OpenZoo

A framework for distributed stream and batch processing

View project on GitHub

Authors

Michalis Lazaridis
Thodoris Semertzidis
Dimitris Samaras

OpenZoo has been developed and maintained by the Visual Computing Lab (VCL) of the Information Technologies Institute (ITI), which is a founding member of the Centre for Research & Technology Hellas (CERTH).

Contributions

We are, of course, open to new ideas, modifications, bug reports and pull requests.
